column4: Im having a odd ACPI issue with a Thinkpad R61 and the latest updates of Ubuntu Gutsy in that it does not seem to work at all, Shutting the lid does not make the laptop enter suspend and disconnecting the AC line makes the machine hibernate :P
have you tried ThinkWiki? They had some good how-tos
Hibernate does not work either as I get graphical corruption and the inablity to log into the desktop enviroment (although GDM loads) untill I reboot
I tried following their guides with no luck :(
